programs.title: IBM Full Stack Software Developer - Professional Certificate
programs.description: A hands-on full-stack cloud development program covering modern front-end, back-end, DevOps, and cloud-native technologies with real-world projects.

courses.title: Introduction to Software Engineering
courses.description: An industry-focused foundations program in software engineering covering SDLC, Python, and modern architecture and design practices.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Introduction to Software Engineering.jpg

courses.title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
courses.description: Foundational course covering cloud computing concepts, service models, deployment types, and major cloud platforms.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Introduction to Cloud Computing.jpg

courses.title: Introduction to HTML, CSSS & JavaScript
courses.description: Introduction to web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with hands-on client-side scripting.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Introduction to HTML, CSS & JavaScript.jpg

courses.title: Getting Started with Git and GitHub
courses.description: Foundations of Git, GitHub, and modern collaborative development workflows.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Getting Started with Git and GitHub.jpg

courses.title: Developing Front-End Apps with React
courses.description: IPractical front-end development course using React, reusable components, and modern JavaScript features.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Developing Front-End Apps with React.jpg

courses.title: Developing Back-End Apps with Node.js and Express
courses.description: Hands-on course focused on building server-side applications using Node.js, Express, and asynchronous programming concepts.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Developing Back-End Apps With Node.js and Express.jpg

courses.title: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
courses.description: Comprehensive foundational course in Python covering programming fundamentals, data handling, APIs, and basic data science workflows.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Python for Data Science, AI & Development.jpg

courses.title: Developing AI Applications with Python and Flask
courses.description: Practical course focused on building and deploying AI-enabled web applications using Python, Flask, and REST APIs.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Developing AI Applications with Python and Flask.jpg

courses.title: Django Application Development with SQL and Databases
courses.description: Hands-on course focused on building database-driven web applications using Django, SQL, and ORM concepts.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Django Apllication Development with SQL and Databases.jpg

courses.title: Introduction to Containers w/ Docker, Kubernetes & OpenShift
courses.description: Introduction to containerized and cloud-native application development using Docker, Kubernetes, and OpenShift.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Introduction to Containers with Docker, Kubernetes & OpenShift.jpg

courses.title: Application Development using Microservices and Serverless
courses.description: Hands-on course focused on building and deploying microservices and serverless applications using modern cloud-native architectures.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Application Development using Microservices and Serverless.jpg

courses.title: Full Stack Application Development Capstone Project
courses.description: End-to-end capstone project integrating front-end, back-end, and cloud deployment in a real-world web application.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer//Full Stack Application Development Capstone Project.jpg

courses.title: Full Stack Software Developer Assessment
courses.description: Final assessment demonstrating end-to-end full-stack, cloud-native, and deployment expertise.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Full Stack Software Developer Assessment.jpg

courses.title: Generative AI: Elevate your Software Development Career
courses.description: Industry-focused course on using generative AI for code generation, optimization, and modern software workflows.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Generative AI Elevate your Software Development Career.jpg

courses.title: Software Developer Career Guide and Interview Preparation
courses.description: Career-focused course covering software developer roles, job preparation strategies, and technical and behavioral interview readiness.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/IBM/IBM Full Stack Software Developer/Software Developer Career Guide and Interview Preparation.jpg

programs.title: Java: Data Structures and Algorithms
programs.description: In-depth specialization focused on implementing and analyzing data structures and algorithms using Java.

courses.title: Java: Algorithms
courses.description: Algorithm-focused course covering time and space complexity, core design techniques, and searching and sorting algorithms in Java.

courses.title: Java: Linear Data Structures and Trees
courses.description: Practical study of linked lists, stacks, queues, and tree data structures implemented in Java.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/Codio/Java Data Structures and Algorithms/Java Linear Data Structures and Trees.jpg

courses.title: Java: Non-Linear Data Structures
courses.description: Advanced course focused on implementing and optimizing non-linear data structures such as graphs, heaps, and hash-based structures in Java.
courses.certificateImage: ../assets/certs/Codio/Java Data Structures and Algorithms/Java Non-Linear Data Structures.jpg
